class.name: Phaser.Canvas
class.help: The Canvas class handles everything related to creating the `canvas` DOM tag that Phaser will use, including styles, offset and aspect ratio.

public.name: addToDOM
public.help: Adds the given canvas element to the DOM. The canvas will be added as a child of the given parent.\nIf no parent is given it will be added as a child of the document.body.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: The canvas to be added to the DOM.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.help: The DOM element to add the canvas to.

parameters.name: overflowHidden
parameters.help: If set to true it will add the overflow='hidden' style to the parent DOM element.

public.name: create
public.help: Creates a `canvas` DOM element. The element is not automatically added to the document.

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: The width of the canvas element.

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: The height of the canvas element..

parameters.name: id
parameters.help: If given this will be set as the ID of the canvas element, otherwise no ID will be set.

public.name: getAspectRatio

returns.help: The ratio between canvas' width and height.

public.help: Returns the aspect ratio of the given canvas.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: The canvas to get the aspect ratio from.

public.name: getOffset

returns.help: - A point objet with the offsetX and Y as its properties.

public.help: Get the DOM offset values of any given element

parameters.name: element
parameters.help: The targeted element that we want to retrieve the offset.

parameters.name: point
parameters.help: The point we want to take the x/y values of the offset.

public.name: getSmoothingEnabled

returns.help: True if the given context has image smoothing enabled, otherwise false.

public.help: Returns `true` if the given context has image smoothing enabled, otherwise returns `false`.

parameters.name: context
parameters.help: The context to check for smoothing on.

public.name: removeFromDOM
public.help: Removes the given canvas element from the DOM.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: The canvas to be removed from the DOM.

public.name: setBackgroundColor
public.help: Sets the background color behind the canvas. This changes the canvas style property.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: The canvas to set the background color on.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: The color to set. Can be in the format 'rgb(r,g,b)', or '#RRGGBB' or any valid CSS color.

public.name: setImageRenderingBicubic
public.help: Sets the CSS image-rendering property on the given canvas to be 'bicubic' (aka 'auto').\nNote that if this doesn't given the desired result then see the CanvasUtils.setSmoothingEnabled method.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: The canvas to set image-rendering bicubic on.

public.name: setImageRenderingCrisp
public.help: Sets the CSS image-rendering property on the given canvas to be 'crisp' (aka 'optimize contrast' on webkit).\nNote that if this doesn't given the desired result then see the setSmoothingEnabled.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: The canvas to set image-rendering crisp on.

public.name: setSmoothingEnabled
public.help:
Sets the Image Smoothing property on the given context. Set to false to disable image smoothing.
By default browsers have image smoothing enabled, which isn't always what you visually want, especially
when using pixel art in a game. Note that this sets the property on the context itself, so that any image
drawn to the context will be affected. This sets the property across all current browsers but support is
patchy on earlier browsers, especially on mobile.

parameters.name: context
parameters.help: The context to enable or disable the image smoothing on.

parameters.name: value
parameters.help: If set to true it will enable image smoothing, false will disable it.

public.name: setTouchAction
public.help: Sets the touch-action property on the canvas style. Can be used to disable default browser touch actions.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: The canvas to set the touch action on.

parameters.name: value
parameters.help: The touch action to set. Defaults to 'none'.

public.name: setTransform
public.help: Sets the transform of the given canvas to the matrix values provided.

parameters.name: context
parameters.help: The context to set the transform on.

parameters.name: translateX
parameters.help: The value to translate horizontally by.

parameters.name: translateY
parameters.help: The value to translate vertically by.

parameters.name: scaleX
parameters.help: The value to scale horizontally by.

parameters.name: scaleY
parameters.help: The value to scale vertically by.

parameters.name: skewX
parameters.help: The value to skew horizontaly by.

parameters.name: skewY
parameters.help: The value to skew vertically by.

public.name: setUserSelect
public.help: Sets the user-select property on the canvas style. Can be used to disable default browser selection actions.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: The canvas to set the touch action on.

parameters.name: value
parameters.help: The touch action to set. Defaults to 'none'.
